head.title: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: xsl:if

meta.name: title
meta.content: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: xsl:if

body.p: The xsl:if element is used for conditional processing. It takes a mandatory test attribute, whose value is a boolean expression. The contents of the xsl:if element are expanded only of the expression is true.
The full syntax of boolean expressions is outlined in XPath Expression Syntax.
This includes a hyperlink in the output only if the current element has a preface attribute.
